Package control.viewcomunication.translation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntitiesDatabase
    This interface declare methods to manage a database that associate to each game entity to view representation.
    GameWorldTranslator
    Interface that declares methods to translate model's entities to elements that the view can correctly print.
    InputManager
    Interface that declares methods for a working input manager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodesIteratorImpl
    Iterator for game's codes.
    EntitiesDatabaseImpl
    Implementation of EntityDatabase interface with a map that associates to each entity code an element of view's enumeration Entities.
    GameWorldTranslatorImpl
    Class that translate model's entities to view entities, translate positions for a correct view print.
    InputManagerImpl
    This class takes all view key's events and save their translation to model actions in a circle queue.
